product_name: Pearl Izumi Maverick Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Enjoy 2-in-1 comfort as you run in the men's Pearl Izumi Maverick Shorts. Fully integrated liner brief wicks moisture away from your skin to the outer fabric, which dries incredibly fast. Outer shorts made of 100% polyester wick moisture, dry fast and offer UPF 50+. Minerale-polyester liner brief dries 50% faster than ordinary polyester, offering evaporative cooling and odor resistance. Minerale technology will not wash off or wear out; simply wash the shorts to renew their performance qualities. Waist has smooth front panel with elasticized sides and back; stretch drawcord fine-tunes the fit. 1 zippered back pocket. Pearl Izumi Maverick Shorts for men have reflective hits. Closeout.
